about.title: Almas Kavir Rafsanjan
about.subtitle: Excellence in Iranian Ceramic & Granite Tile Manufacturing
about.milestonesDesc: Key moments that shaped our journey
about.capabilitiesDesc: What makes our production and service stand out
about.certificationsDesc: Internationally recognized quality and management standards
about.overviewCard1Desc: A premium Iranian manufacturer of ceramic and granite tiles with 14+ years of experience, based in Rafsanjan, Kerman Province.
about.overviewCard2Desc: Certified by ISO 9001, 14001, and 45001, we deliver consistent quality, sustainable practices, and safe operations.
about.overviewCard3Desc: Complete design-to-production capability across wall, ceramic, and granite tiles for residential and commercial projects.
about.storyCard1Desc: Almas Kavir Rafsanjan stands as a distinguished manufacturer of premium ceramic and granite tiles. For over 14 years, we have specialized in the complete design and production cycle, bringing lasting quality to spaces across Iran and 13 countries.
about.storyCard2Desc: ISO 9001, 14001, and 45001 certifications demonstrate our commitment to quality, environment, and safety—supported by advanced technology and skilled craftsmanship.
about.cert2Description: Occupational Health and Safety Management System
about.cert4Description: Combined certification for all three management systems

faq.label: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.title: Everything You Need to Know
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about Almas Kavir Rafsanjan's ceramic tiles, manufacturing processes, certifications, and services.
faq.q1: What certifications does Almas Kavir Rafsanjan have?
faq.a1: We are certified with ISO 9001:2015 (Quality Management System), ISO 14001:2015 (Environmental Management System), and ISO 45001:2018 (Occupational Health and Safety Management System). These certifications ensure our products meet international quality standards.
faq.q2: What tile sizes and types do you manufacture?
faq.a2: We manufacture ceramic tiles, granite tiles, and wall tiles in various dimensions including 30x30, 30x90, 40x40, 40x100, 60x60, 60x120, 80x80, and 100x100 cm. Our product range includes Matt, Polished, and Trans surface finishes.
faq.q3: Do you export your products internationally?
faq.a3: Yes, we export our premium ceramic and granite tiles to 13 countries worldwide. Our export services include comprehensive consulting, international transport logistics, legal documentation handling, and post-delivery support.
faq.q4: Where is your manufacturing facility located?
faq.a4: Our main manufacturing facility is located 10 kilometers from Rafsanjan-Kerman Road in Rafsanjan, Kerman Province, Iran. This strategic location allows us to serve both domestic and international markets efficiently.
faq.q5: How long has Almas Kavir Rafsanjan been in business?
faq.a5: We have been manufacturing premium ceramic and granite tiles for over 14 years. Our extensive experience in the industry has made us a trusted partner for architects, designers, and construction companies worldwide.
faq.q6: What makes your ceramic tiles different from competitors?
faq.a6: Our tiles combine traditional Iranian craftsmanship with modern technology. We use premium materials, maintain strict quality control through ISO certifications, and offer a wide range of designs and sizes. Our environmental management system ensures sustainable production practices.
faq.q7: Can you provide custom tile solutions for large projects?
faq.a7: Yes, we offer customization services for large-volume orders exceeding 100,000 m². We can adapt our production for unique projects, providing custom dimensions, designs, colors, and packaging tailored to specific market needs.
faq.q8: What technical specifications do your tiles meet?
faq.a8: Our tiles meet high technical standards including water absorption < 0.5%, compressive strength > 50 N/mm², abrasion resistance PEI 4-5, and slip resistance R10-R12. All specifications comply with international ceramic tile standards.
faq.q9: How can I request a quote or samples?
faq.a9: You can contact us through our website contact form, email us at info@almasceram.com, or call us directly. We provide detailed quotations, technical catalogs, and can arrange sample delivery for your project evaluation.
faq.q10: Do you offer installation guidance and support?
faq.a10: Yes, we provide comprehensive installation guidance and technical support. Our expert team offers consultation from product selection to installation guidance on-site, ensuring optimal results for your projects.
faq.ctaDescription: Our expert team is here to help you with any questions about our ceramic tiles, technical specifications, or project requirements.
